function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low percentage of outside air in HVAC system","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne pathogen transmission due to inadequate ventilation","Mitigation":"Increase the percentage of outside air in the HVAC system to improve ventilation","Technologies":"High-level air filtration (MERV 13 or above), ventilation system upgrades","People":"Building occupants, especially in indoor spaces","Owner":"Building management, HVAC maintenance teams"},{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of high-level air filtration","Impact":"Potential reduction in room ventilation and increased risk of transmission","Mitigation":"Ensure that high-level filtration does not decrease room ventilation, consider alternative filtration options","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, flow resistance monitoring technology","People":"Building occupants, especially in indoor spaces","Owner":"HVAC maintenance teams, building management"}]}
